title: SET_VEHICLE_NEXT_GEAR
content:
0x3A4566F4// SetVehicleNextGear
void SET_VEHICLE_NEXT_GEAR(Vehicle vehicle, int nextGear);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.nextGear: The vehicles next gear.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleNextGear
void SET_VEHICLE_NEXT_GEAR(Vehicle vehicle, int nextGear);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_NEXT_GEAR
SetVehicleNextGear(vehicle, 0)
